videos.title: How Bad Do You Want It?
videos.author: Eric Thomas

videos.title: It's Not Over Until You Win
videos.author: Les Brown

quotes.text: Discipline equals freedom.
quotes.author: Jocko Willink

quotes.text: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Your problem is not a lack of time, it's a lack of focus.
quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

quotes.text: Suffer the pain of discipline or suffer the pain of regret.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: Don't stop when you're tired. Stop when you're done.
quotes.author: David Goggins

quotes.text: The impediment to action advances action. What stands in the way becomes the way.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.text: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Obsession is a word the lazy use to describe the dedicated.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Win the morning, win the day.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.text: Your level of success will seldom exceed your level of personal development.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: I fear not the man who has practiced 10,000 kicks once, but I fear the man who has practiced one kick 10,000 times.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: Don't count the days, make the days count.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

quotes.text: Hard work outweighs talent when talent doesn't work hard.
quotes.author: Tim Notke

quotes.text: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: Amateurs sit and wait for inspiration, the rest of us just get up and go to work.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.text: The best revenge is massive success.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.text: If you're going through hell, keep going.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
quotes.author: George Addair

quotes.text: Discipline is choosing between what you want now and what you want most.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: If it was easy, everyone would do it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Great things never came from comfort zones.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Standardize before you optimize.
quotes.author: James Clear

quotes.text: Focus on the system, not the goal.
quotes.author: James Clear

quotes.text: Every action you take is a vote for the type of person you wish to become.
quotes.author: James Clear

quotes.text: Small habits don't add up, they compound.
quotes.author: James Clear

quotes.text: The work you are avoiding is where the growth is.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: You do not rise to the level of your goals. You fall to the level of your systems.
quotes.author: Archilochus

quotes.text: Motivation gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
quotes.author: Jim Ryun

quotes.text: The master has failed more times than the beginner has even tried.
quotes.author: Stephen McCranie

quotes.text: Do today what others won't, so you can do tomorrow what others can't.
quotes.author: Jerry Rice

quotes.text: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.text: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: Keep your face always toward the sunshine - and shadows will fall behind you.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.text: Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: You learn more from failure than from success. Don't let it stop you. Failure builds character.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Whether you think you can or think you can't, you're right.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: To see what is right and not do it is a lack of courage.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Reading is to the mind what exercise is to the body.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.text: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: The future depends on what you do today.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: Believe in yourself. You are braver than you think, more talented than you know, and capable of more than you imagine.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: Dream big and dare to fail.
quotes.author: Norman Vaughan

quotes.text: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.text: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me.
quotes.author: Carol Burnett

quotes.text: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: The quality of your life is the quality of your relationships.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Identify your problems, but give your power and energy to solutions.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: In your moments of decision, your destiny is shaped.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: The path to success is to take massive, determined action.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: If you do what you've always done, you'll get what you've always gotten.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: It is not what we do once in a while that shapes our lives. It's what we do consistently.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Where focus goes, energy flows.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: The only limit to your impact is your imagination and commitment.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: You can't have a better tomorrow if you're still thinking about yesterday.
quotes.author: Charles Kettering

quotes.text: The difference between who you are and who you want to be is what you do.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Don't wish it were easier, wish you were better.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: The project you are most afraid of is the one you should do first.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
quotes.author: Jim Ryun

quotes.text: A year from now you may wish you had started today.
quotes.author: Karen Lamb

quotes.text: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.text: The man who has no imagination has no wings.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: Don't let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: Do not let making a living prevent you from making a life.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: Success is never final, failure is never fatal. It's courage that counts.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn't work hard.
quotes.author: Tim Notke

quotes.text: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.text: The day you give up on your dreams is the day you give up on yourself.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Continuous improvement is better than delayed perfection.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: The secret of your future is hidden in your daily routine.
quotes.author: Mike Murdock

quotes.text: If you don't build your dream, someone will hire you to build theirs.
quotes.author: Tony Gaskins

quotes.text: To handle yourself, use your head; to handle others, use your heart.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: You must do the thing you think you cannot do.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
